mapper.update: UPDATE T_BOARD SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_TYPE = @board_type AND SEQ = @seq
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_TYPE ,A.SEQ ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENTS ,A.VIEW_CNT ,A.STATUS ,INET_NTOA(A.REG_IP) AS REG_IP ,A.REG_UID ,A.REG_USERNAME ,A.REG_DATE FROM T_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = @board_type AND A.SEQ = @seq AND A.STATUS >= 0 ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC
SELECT COUNT(A.SEQ) AS CNT FROM T_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = @board_type AND A.STATUS >= 0
SELECT A.BOARD_TYPE ,A.SEQ ,A.TITLE ,A.VIEW_CNT ,A.STATUS ,INET_NTOA(A.REG_IP) AS REG_IP ,A.REG_UID ,A.REG_USERNAME ,A.REG_DATE FROM T_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = @board_type ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD ( BOARD_TYPE ,TITLE ,CONTENTS ,VIEW_CNT ,STATUS ,REG_IP ,REG_UID ,REG_USERNAME ,REG_DATE ) SELECT @BOARD_TYPE ,@TITLE ,@CONTENTS ,@VIEW_CNT ,0 ,INET_ATON(CASE WHEN @REG_IP = '::1' THEN '127.0.0.1' ELSE @REG_IP END) ,@REG_UID ,@REG_USERNAME ,now()
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_TYPE ,A.SEQ ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENTS ,A.VIEW_CNT ,A.STATUS ,INET_NTOA(A.REG_IP) AS REG_IP ,A.REG_UID ,A.REG_USERNAME ,A.REG_DATE FROM T_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_TYPE = @board_type AND A.SEQ = @seq
